item.title: Alabama to execute man for 1997 shooting death of store clerk
item.description: Alabama is preparing to execute a man convicted of killing a woman during a 1997 gas station robbery

item.title: White House budget office tells agencies to draft mass firing plans
item.description: The White House is telling agencies to prepare large-scale firings of federal workers if the government shuts down next week

item.title: Texas man facing execution for fatally beating 13-month-old girl during 'exorcism'
item.description: A Texas man is facing execution for killing his girlfriend’s 13-month-old daughter in what the couple had said was part of an “exorcism” to expel a de...

item.title: China, world’s largest carbon polluting nation, announces new climate goal to cut emissions
item.description: China, the world’s largest carbon polluting nation, has announced a new climate fighting goal to cut emissions by 7% to 10% by 2035

item.title: Ukraine’s president says the world is in `the most destructive arms race in human history’
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is telling world leaders that the world is in “the most destructive arms race in human history."
